title: Sparse graph pretraining
abstract: We study sparse graph pretraining for robust node classification under distribution shift.
text: Sparse graph pretraining for robust node classification under distribution shift.

title: Kernel bounds for optimization
abstract: We derive convergence bounds for stochastic optimization with adaptive kernels.
text: Convergence bounds for stochastic optimization with adaptive kernels.

title: Transformer regularization
abstract: A regularization method improves transformer calibration on out of domain benchmarks.
text: Regularization improves transformer calibration on out of domain benchmarks.

title: Bayesian posterior contraction
abstract: Posterior contraction rates are established for hierarchical priors in inverse problems.
text: Posterior contraction rates for hierarchical priors in inverse problems.

title: Combinatorial scheduling
abstract: Approximation algorithms reduce latency in constrained combinatorial scheduling.
text: Approximation algorithms reduce latency in constrained combinatorial scheduling.

title: Differential equation solvers
abstract: Neural differential equation solvers stabilize training with adaptive step control.
text: Neural differential equation solvers stabilize training with adaptive step control.

title: Matrix completion guarantees
abstract: We prove sample complexity guarantees for noisy low rank matrix completion.
text: Sample complexity guarantees for noisy low rank matrix completion.

title: Causal representation learning
abstract: Invariant causal representation learning improves transfer across interventions.
text: Invariant causal representation learning improves transfer across interventions.

title: Approximate nearest neighbors
abstract: A hashed index accelerates approximate nearest neighbor retrieval in high dimensions.
text: Hashed index accelerates approximate nearest neighbor retrieval in high dimensions.

title: Type theoretic semantics
abstract: Dependent type semantics for verified numerical software are introduced.
text: Dependent type semantics for verified numerical software.

title: Graph signal denoising
abstract: Spectral graph signal denoising is improved with wavelet thresholding.
text: Spectral graph signal denoising improved with wavelet thresholding.

title: Convex relaxation methods
abstract: Convex relaxation yields tractable estimates for discrete latent variable models.
text: Convex relaxation yields tractable estimates for discrete latent variable models.

title: Phonon transport in alloys
abstract: We model phonon transport and thermal conductivity in disordered alloys.
text: Phonon transport and thermal conductivity in disordered alloys.

title: Topological band structures
abstract: Topological band structures are characterized by Berry curvature measurements.
text: Topological band structures characterized by Berry curvature measurements.

title: Plasma confinement scaling
abstract: Scaling laws for turbulent plasma confinement are tested in tokamak simulations.
text: Scaling laws for turbulent plasma confinement in tokamak simulations.

title: Defect migration barriers
abstract: First principles calculations estimate defect migration barriers in ceramics.
text: First principles calculations estimate defect migration barriers in ceramics.

title: Spin orbit coupling
abstract: Spin orbit coupling induces anisotropic transport in layered quantum materials.
text: Spin orbit coupling induces anisotropic transport in layered quantum materials.

title: Neutron scattering spectra
abstract: Neutron scattering spectra reveal magnetic excitations in correlated systems.
text: Neutron scattering spectra reveal magnetic excitations in correlated systems.

title: Perovskite phase stability
abstract: Temperature dependent phase stability of perovskites is studied by diffraction.
text: Temperature dependent phase stability of perovskites studied by diffraction.

title: Battery electrode stress
abstract: Chemo mechanical stress evolution is quantified in battery electrode particles.
text: Chemo mechanical stress evolution quantified in battery electrode particles.

title: Quantum Hall transitions
abstract: Critical exponents near quantum Hall transitions are measured with high precision.
text: Critical exponents near quantum Hall transitions measured with high precision.

title: Nonlinear optics waveguides
abstract: Nonlinear optical waveguides exhibit tunable frequency conversion efficiency.
text: Nonlinear optical waveguides exhibit tunable frequency conversion efficiency.

title: Magnetocaloric compounds
abstract: Entropy change in magnetocaloric compounds is linked to field induced transitions.
text: Entropy change in magnetocaloric compounds linked to field induced transitions.

title: Microstructure fracture mechanics
abstract: Microstructure informed fracture mechanics predicts crack growth in composites.
text: Microstructure informed fracture mechanics predicts crack growth in composites.

title: Catalytic reaction networks
abstract: Kinetic modeling identifies rate limiting steps in catalytic reaction networks.
text: Kinetic modeling identifies rate limiting steps in catalytic reaction networks.

title: Electrochemical reactor design
abstract: Electrochemical reactor geometry improves mass transfer and selectivity.
text: Electrochemical reactor geometry improves mass transfer and selectivity.

title: Polymerization control
abstract: Controlled radical polymerization tunes molecular weight distribution.
text: Controlled radical polymerization tunes molecular weight distribution.

title: Membrane separation performance
abstract: Membrane morphology governs permeability and rejection in gas separations.
text: Membrane morphology governs permeability and rejection in gas separations.

title: Process intensification
abstract: Heat integrated process intensification reduces utility consumption in distillation.
text: Heat integrated process intensification reduces utility consumption in distillation.

title: Combustion emission pathways
abstract: Reaction pathway analysis explains soot precursor formation in combustion.
text: Reaction pathway analysis explains soot precursor formation in combustion.

title: Surface adsorption isotherms
abstract: Adsorption isotherms quantify uptake of organics on porous sorbents.
text: Adsorption isotherms quantify uptake of organics on porous sorbents.

title: Bioreactor oxygen transfer
abstract: Scale up correlations predict oxygen transfer in aerobic bioreactors.
text: Scale up correlations predict oxygen transfer in aerobic bioreactors.

title: Solvent extraction equilibria
abstract: Liquid liquid equilibria are measured for solvent extraction of rare earths.
text: Liquid liquid equilibria measured for solvent extraction of rare earths.

title: Catalyst deactivation modeling
abstract: A deactivation model captures coke deposition during hydrocarbon conversion.
text: A deactivation model captures coke deposition during hydrocarbon conversion.

title: Fluidized bed hydrodynamics
abstract: Eulerian simulations estimate mixing and residence time in fluidized beds.
text: Eulerian simulations estimate mixing and residence time in fluidized beds.

title: Green solvent synthesis
abstract: Sustainable routes produce green solvents with improved atom economy.
text: Sustainable routes produce green solvents with improved atom economy.
